alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 11 at 11:26AM MST until January 13 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM MST THIS EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, while snow showers will linger over the higher terrain through the afternoon, clear skies are moving over the region and rates have come down or stopped. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 18 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains and Flat Tops. * WHEN...From 11 PM MST this evening through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops. Dangerously cold wind chills as low as 40 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops
